pageContext.claim: “Our military is being mobilized at the Southern Border. Many more troops coming. We will NOT let these Caravans, which are also made up of some very bad thugs and gang members, into the U.S. Our Border is sacred, must come in legally. TURN AROUND!”
pageContext.analysis: While there is no official count, most reports say the caravan is full of women and children. As for there being "very bad thugs and gang members," any group that large is bound to have some bad apples, but Trump is exaggerating even by the administration's count.
